response.overview: Defne is a journalist who is very successful in her job. A successful news reporter, the young woman goes to Malatya with her teammates to follow the Malatya Film Festival. As they enter the way back after the end of the festival, a sign on the road attracts Defne's attention. Her curiosity about the sign leads Defne to a small village. Defne, who goes to the village with the team, is faced with events that they cannot understand. Having witnessed more and more terrible events, Defne and her friends look for a way out of the situation they are in.
response.title: Zir-i Cin
